title: Diary of Steve the Noob 18 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: This diary is 14,300 words with 20 pictures. You probably already guessed what this book is going to be about. :) Yay! About time, huh? Have fun reading book 18! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
